ISSUE.TITLE: Issue with @await syntax in cshtml file in AmazonPay plugin
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Hi there is a problem with "@await something" in cshtml files in AmazonPay plugin There should be "@(await something)" this https://github.com/nopSolutions/nopCommerce/pull/7464 fixes this issue

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #7465 Issue with @await syntax in cshtml file in AmazonPay plugin related to #6969 Co-authored-by: Jan Nielsen <jan@nielsen.family>
